altTitles.ja: アグラビティボーイズ

description.en:
The year 2118… Four young astronauts head out to the stars to find humanity's new frontier…or so they thought! Two days after they depart, earth is devoured by a black hole! Plunged into a destiny they cannot escape, these unique young men reach their destination of Alpha Jumbro and plan to live out the rest of their lives there. How will humanity survive in this wacky space-survival comedy?!  


---
description.ru: 2118 год… четверо юных астронавтов отправляются покорять новые рубежи человечества… точнее, так им казалось! Через два дня после отправки на Земле устроили ядерную войну, а потом её поглотила чёрная дыра. Оказавшись в лапах неизбежной судьбы, эти юноши достигли точки своего назначения — планеты Альфа Джамбро, и решили прожить там до конца своих дней. Как же выживет человечество в этой безумной комедии о космическом выживании?!

altTitles.ja: あやかしトライアングル

description.en:
Ever since he was a boy, Matsuri Kazamaki has worked as an exorcist. Because his childhood friend Suzu Kanade attracts malicious spirits called ayakashi like moths to a flame, Matsuri is tasked with slaying any with ill intentions.   
  
One day, an ayakashi named Shirogane notices the budding romance between these two childhood friends. Eager to both devour Suzu and foil Matsuri’s chance at love, he performs a forbidden spell…  
  
The newest series by Kentaro Yabuki, creator of Black Cat and artist behind To Love Ru and Darling in the Franxx.
description.fr: Depuis son enfance, Matsuri Kazamaki travaille comme exorciste. Parce que son ami d'enfance Suzu Kanade attire à une flamme des esprits malveillants appelés ayakashi comme des papillons de nuit, Matsuri est chargé de tuer tous ceux qui ont de mauvaises intentions. Un jour, un ayakashi nommé Shirogane remarque la romance naissante entre ces deux amis d'enfance. Désireux à la fois de dévorer Suzu et de déjouer les chances de Matsuri de s'aimer, il exécute un sort interdit…
description.it: Il Giappone sembra invaso da misteriosi mostri chiamati Ayakashi, ma a contrastare la minaccia esiste una forza speciale, i ninja esorcisti! Il giovane ninja esorcista Matsuri passa le giornate a combatterli e a proteggere la sua amica d'infanzia Suzu. Quando appare un ayakashi chiamato Shirogane, le cose si stravolgono! Kentaro Yabuki torna su Shonen Jump con una nuova serie fantasy, ricca di ayakashi e romanticismo!
description.ru:
Японию начали наводнять таинственные монстры — Аякаси. Ниндзя-экзорцист по имени Мацури неустанно борется с ними изо дня в день, чтобы уберечь себя и свою подругу детства Сузу. Однако, после появления кота-аякаси по имени Широганэ, всё переворачивается с ног на голову!  
Сможет ли наш отважный герой справиться с возникшей напастью? С этого и начинается наше приключение от всеми известного мангаки Кэнтаро Ябуки, который вернулся в Джамп со своей новой фэнтези историей с привкусом романтики!
description.pt-br:
Desde menino, Matsuri Kazamaki trabalha como exorcista.  Porque seu amigo de infância Suzu Kanade atrai espíritos maliciosos chamados ayakashi como mariposas para uma chama, Matsuri é encarregado de matar qualquer um com más intenções.
  
Um dia, um ayakashi chamado Shirogane percebe o romance entre esses dois amigos de infância.  Ansioso para devorar Suzu e frustrar a chance de amor de Matsuri, ele realiza um feitiço proibido…
  
|| A mais nova série de Kentaro Yabuki, criador de Black Cat e artista por trás de To Love Ru e Darling in the Franxx. ||

altTitles.th: ท่านอ๋องแหย่ไม่ได้

description.en: Waking up in a coffin is bad enough, what more turning into a man! Kneeling on the ground, Lin Han laments and cries out, "time-traveling isn't fun at all!"

Humans and elves coexisted on the continent. Due to the Demon King’s curse, females will no longer... be born???In order to save the humans, the elves added a new law to the land. This law allowed humans to continue to reproduce, and that law is...

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

description.en: Asuka helped someone who turned out to be a witch and as thanks she offered him one wish. He said he had just been put in a women's dorm even though he's a boy. She misinterprets this, turns his body into a girl, and runs away before he can react. He must now attend school as a girl and look for the witch in his spare time so she can change him back.

altTitles.ja: サベージファングお嬢様, サベージファングお嬢様 史上最強の傭兵は史上最凶の暴虐令嬢となって二度目の世界を無双する
サベージファングお嬢様
Savage Fang Ojou-sama: Shijou Saikyou no Youhei wa Shijou Sai Kyou no Bougyaku Reijou to Natte Futatabime no Sekai o Musou Suru

altTitles.en: Savage Fang Ojou-sama: The Most Powerful Mercenary in History Becomes the Most Tyrannical Daughter in History and Becomes a Warrior in the World for the Second Time
Savage Fang Ojou-sama: The Tale of Little Lady Who Conceals "Savage Fang"

description.en:
This is the story of a "princess" who torments the whole world.
She is loved by God, and she has sunk beautiful hair, and she wields a violent blade. She was the prettiest young lady in the kingdom, but she was the most powerful of mercenaries, nicknamed "Savage Fang." All of them are now beginning to be trampled by a girl who is out of standard!
description.id:
Mylene, putri seorang duke, memiliki rambut indah berkilauan yang disebut sebagai tanda “yang dipilih Dewa” dan memiliki kekuatan sihir yang kuat di tubuhnya. Dia adalah gadis paling cantik di kerajaan, memiliki rambut yang tergerai dan mengayunkan pedangnya dengan anggun. Tapi sebenarnya dia adalah… tentara bayaran terkuat dalam sejarah, yang dikenal sebagai “Savage Fang”! Seorang pejuang legendaris yang telah membantai ribuan musuh dengan kemampuan fisiknya yang luar biasa telah bereinkarnasi sebagai wanita muda yang membanggakan bakat sihir dari dewa! Seorang gadis dengan kekuatan sihir yang tak tertandingi dan keterampilan bertarung yang hebat, dia memikirkan kembali situasi dunia sambil melibatkan orang-orang dari aliansi dan mendominasi benua…! Dia terlihat seperti seorang saint, tapi di dalam dirinya adalah binatang buas. menyembunyikan taring prajuritnya yang ganas di balik senyum seorang wanita muda saat dia berjuang melewati dunia yang penuh dengan kekacauan untuk kedua kalinya!

Serialisasi Savage Fang Ojou-sama akan dirilis pada musim dingin 2022

description.en: After the questionable death of a patient, a young doctor is led to a mysterious club called Kamiya.  Drawn by the allure of an employee and the rumors about vampires in the establishment, she decides to experience the club for herself.
Akihiko Shimura, 20 years old (male). When I woke up in the morning, I was a little blonde loli.
description.ru: Акихико Симура — 20-летний мужчина, который, проснувшись как-то утром, стал маленькой девочкой-блондинкой.

altTitles.ja: フェイト/アポクリファ

description.en:
The setting of Fate/Apocrypha is a parallel world to Fate/stay night where the Greater Grail was removed from Fuyuki after the Third Holy Grail War and disappeared for many years. Around the 2000s, around the same time as the Fifth Holy Grail War would have happened, the group that plundered the Grail, Yggdmillennia, openly declares their secession from the Mage's Association and that they are in possession of the Grail. The Association dispatches fifty magi to retrieve it, but all but one are instantly slaughtered by Lancer of Black. The one remaining manages to activate the reserve system of the Greater Grail, allowing for the summoning of fourteen Servants in total.  
  
This marks the start of the Great Holy Grail War in Trifas, featuring two different factions, the Black Faction, whose members are part of Yggdramillennia, and the Red Faction, whose members were sent by the Mage's Association with the exception of one from the Church. The Grail itself also summons Ruler to act as a mediator of the Holy Grail War.
description.ru: События Fate/Apocrypha происходят в мире параллельном миру Fate/stay night, в котором Грааль был убран из города Фуюки после Третьей Войны. История начинается с того, что в Румынии был обнаружен «726-ой Святой Грааль». Его похитила и привезла в Румынию семья Иггдмилленния. Это знаменует начало Великой Войны Святого Грааля в городе Трифас с двумя противоборствующими сторонами: Чёрная Фракция, члены которой являются частью семьи Иггдмилленния и Красная Фракция, члены которой были посланы Ассоциацией Магов, за исключением одного участника от Церкви. Грааль также призывает Рулера выступать в качестве посредника в Войне Святого Грааля.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity III: The Stage of Carnage, Shimousa – Seven Duels of Swordmasters

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order: Epic of Remnant - Ashu Tokuiten 3 / Ashu Heikou Sekai - Shizan Ketsuga Butai Shimousa no Kuni - Eirei Kengou Nanaban Shoubu

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order: Epic of Remnant－亜種特異点３／亜種並行世界　屍山血河舞台　下総国　英霊剣豪七番勝負

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий Приказ -Эпопея Остатка- Турнир Семи Героев-Мастеров Меча

description.en: Fans of Fate/Grand Order—rejoice! A new side story appears...with all the twists and turns you might expect! Epic of Remnant is here!
description.ru: Манга-адаптация одноименного сюжетного акта игры Fate/Grand Order. Фуджимару теряет сознание и, придя в себя, понимает, что очутилась в Японии периода Эдо. Там она встречает Миямото Мусаши, которую когда-то уже видела во сне. Исторически Мусаши был мужчиной, который прославился на весь мир как мастер меча. Почему же теперь их двое, мужчина и женщина с одним именем? Настало время начала Семи Поединков Мастеров Меча!

description.en: A miraculous account of a doubter who was turned into a woman by the one true god. "If you cannot make a girl fall in love with you as a woman your punishment will be to remain a woman for the rest of her life." Thus spoke INSR-sama - the powerful holy lesbian fox goddess who rules our lives - hallowed will be thy name.

title.en: Don't worry, even if you became a girl we're still best friends!

altTitles.ja: 大丈夫、お前が女になっても俺たちは親友だからな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Daijoubu, Omae ga Onna ni Nattemo Oretachi wa Shin'yuu dakara na!

altTitles.vi: Đừng lo lắng, kể cả khi cậu biến thành con gái, thì chúng ta vẫn là bạn tốt!

title.en: Forced to Be an Invincible Saintess

altTitles.zh-ro: Bèi Pò Chéngwéi Kāi Guà De Wúdí Shèng Nǚ

altTitles.zh: 被迫成为开挂的无敌圣女

description.en: The true identity of the saint that is worshipped by all the people in the kingdom is actually an average boy? With the beautiful priest, the big breasted knight, and the loli doctor at the side, the road of a saintess is really difficult...

altTitles.ja: 目々盛くんには敵わない

description.en: When Mememori woke up one morning, he had become a girl. She was surprised that she became a girl, but since she was a beauty, she decided to live her life as one!! An exciting TS Comedy opens!
description.fr: Quand Mememori s'est réveillé un matin, il était devenu une fille. Elle est surprise de devenir une fille, mais comme elle est une beauté, elle décide de vivre sa vie comme une fille ! Une comédie passionnante commence!

title.en: Taberu Dake de Level-Up! Damegami to Issho ni Isekai Musou

altTitles.en: LEVEL UP JUST BY EATING! ~I’M PEERLESS IN ANOTHER WORLD WITH A USELESS GODDESS~

altTitles.ja: 食べるだけでレベルアップ！ ～駄女神といっしょに異世界無双～

description.en:
The Useless Goddess Laura whose only strong point is having huge breasts,  
  
And the boy Keima who was summoned to another world.  
  
Gaining a cheat skill that absorbs the abilities of what he eats, he enjoys the other world life eating delicious monsters and playing with the easy to handle Goddess.
description.pt-br:
A Inútil Deusa Laura cujo único ponto forte é ter seios enormes,

E o menino Kehma que foi convocado para outro mundo.

Ganhando uma habilidade de trapaça que absorve as habilidades do que ele come, ele aproveita a vida no outro mundo comendo monstros deliciosos e brincando com a Deusa fácil de lidar.

title.en: Onii-chan is Done For! Official Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja-ro: Onii-chan wa Oshimai! Koushiki Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい！ 公式アンソロジーコミック

description.en: An anthology comic of Onii-chan wa Oshimai! by various mangaka.

'Lee Jeya' who gets into an accident with his ex-girlfriend from college, 'Han Seori.' When he wakes up, he finds himself 10 years in the past and his and Seori's bodies are switched! Jeya wants to rewrite their failed love story along with Seori during this time. 

"Jeya, you want to go out with me again? Then try seducing me."

But will Jeya be able to seduce Seori when he is  in Seori's body himself?!
